title: DFID Global Mine Action Programme (GMAP 2) 2018-2020 (PO8248) - LOT 2
description: The HALO Trust, Mines Advisory Group (MAG), and the Norwegian People's Aid (NPA) have formed a partnership as leading global mine action organisations to deliver a comprehensive response to DFID?s requirement for Humanitarian Mine Action activities in Burma, Laos, Lebanon, Sri Lanka, South Sudan and Vietnam. The three organisations have decades of experience in delivering relevant activities across the five countries, and will draw on the additional expertise of GICHD and other partners for specific inputs towards delivery of the expected outcomes and impact. MAG will lead the LOT 2 Consortium approach to implementing the project.
